title: Animation-Based Social Studies Simulation Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theory and comprehension of social studies curriculum content
context.additional_context: Course for pre-service teachers to empirically explore animation utilization effects in social studies lessons while practicing instructional design in VR simulation environments

learning_goals: Learners can compare and explain the educational effectiveness differences between animations and static graphics
Learners design lesson simulations using system-paced animations that include audio explanations
Learners develop animated social studies lesson models through project-based assessment and analyze implementation results
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
